name: topbar
objective: Home must be selected by default in top bar
description: Check that Home screen is the default layout. The icon "Home" must be highlighted by default.
pre_condition: start a "fresh" session (logout/login or poweroff/poweron the device)

steps.description: after login in gdm (or autologin), check the screen
steps.expected: the Home screen us the default layout, The "Home" button in the top bar is highlighted

author: root

name: recent_files
description:
Check that the "Recent files" zone is present on Home screen. 

This zone must occupy 2 tiles vertically (1x2)
pre_condition: - have some recent files: for example, create a txt document with gedit and save it.

steps.expected: the recent used files must be displayed

author: root

name: widgets
description: If any, default widgets must be present on home screen. (TODO: does the weather widget must be present, by default ?)
pre_condition:
- start a "fresh" session (logout/login or poweroff/poweron the device)
- if some widgets have been removed for the current user, create a new user to observe the first appearance of the Home screen

steps.expected: the default widgets must be displayed

author: root
